metadata.title: USN-4600-1 -- Netty vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Netty had HTTP request smuggling vulnerabilities. A remote attacker could used it to extract sensitive information. (CVE-2019-16869, CVE-2019-20444, CVE-2019-20445, CVE-2020-7238)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4600-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnetty-3.9-java - 3.9.0.Final-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
